response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (21)", "high", "Young age is associated with higher recidivism risks due to longer potential criminal career and peer influences."],
    ["Gender (male)", "high", "Males statistically demonstrate higher levels of recidivism compared to females."],
    ["Race (White)", "medium", "Being White does not strongly predict recidivism, though it is considered in context with other factors."],
    ["Criminal History (2 arrests, convictions)", "high", "A history of arrests and convictions is one of the strongest predictors of future criminal behavior."],
    ["Substance Use (marijuana and cocaine use in past four years)", "high", "Recent substance use, especially involving cocaine, significantly increases the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Employment Instability (3 jobs during the year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes can indicate instability, although employment itself is a mitigating factor."],
    ["Education (high school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment may be linked to fewer opportunities, increasing risk moderately."],
    ["Living Situation (living alone, never married)", "medium", "Social isolation and lack of familial support can add to risk, though not as strongly as criminal history."],
    ["Childhood Environment (urban area, household size 5, raised by biological mother)", "medium", "An urban upbringing with a moderately sized household can contribute to risk, though the influence is nuanced."],
    ["Religious Beliefs (believes God influences personal destiny)", "low", "Religious belief is generally considered a protective factor or neutral in predicting recidivism."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 4 inches and weighs 190 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
